other_tests.findings: Corrected QT interval is 448 msec; QT interval looks abnormal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On day 6, QT interval was 540 msec and corrected QT interval was 493 msec with giant inverted T waves.

other_tests.findings: Ventricular pacing at a rate of 110 beats per minute completely suppressed the ventricular arrhythmias.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pacing rate was gradually decreased to 80 beats per minute while the dose of metoprolol was increased.

other_tests.findings: Pacing rate reduced to 70 beats per minute.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient experienced ventricular fibrillation and cardiac arrest three days later.

other_tests.findings: Large tumor of the right adrenal gland (4 cm in diameter).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms and electrocardiographic abnormalities resolved post-resection.

other_tests.procedure_name: Measurement of plasma and urinary catecholamines
other_tests.findings: Plasma levels of norepinephrine were very high; urinary levels of epinephrine, norepinephrine, and dopamine were high.
